architecture_principles.api_first: All functionality exposed through well-defined APIs
architecture_principles.data_centric: Building data as the central organizing principle
architecture_principles.scalability: Horizontal scaling capabilities for all components

authentication.session_management: Secure session handling with automatic timeout

data_protection.encryption: Data encrypted at rest and in transit

network_security.vpn: Secure VPN access for remote users

environment_setup.staging: Staging environment for testing and validation

backup_and_recovery.backup_strategy: Automated daily backups with point-in-time recovery

version_control.git_workflow: Feature branch workflow with pull requests

third_party_systems.bim_tools: Integration with Revit, AutoCAD, and other BIM tools
third_party_systems.project_management: Integration with MS Project, Primavera, etc.
third_party_systems.financial_systems: Integration with accounting and ERP systems

support_structure.tier_1: Basic user support and issue resolution

sections.title: Platform Architecture & Infrastructure
sections.goal: Establish the foundational architecture and infrastructure components for the ARXOS platform.
key_tasks: Implement BAS & IoT Platform for building automation systems
Deploy ArxLink RF Node for wireless communication
Create Building Code Model Context Protocol (MCP) integration
Implement Building-Infrastructure-as-code (BIaC) system
Deploy SVGX Geometric Engine for advanced geometric processing
Create Physics Ruleset Engine for physical simulation
Implement Object Extraction and Assembly system
Set up ArxIDE for integrated development environment
Deploy Arxos Sync Agent for data consistency
sections.owner: Infrastructure engineer + Backend lead, supported by DevOps team
success_criteria: All infrastructure components are operational and scalable
Geometric engine processes complex building models efficiently
Physics engine applies physical rules accurately
Sync agent maintains data consistency across all systems
